name: Professor Plum's Fruit Squash
description: Help! The evil professor has taken over the fruit squash factory, sacked all the workers, and has decided to start making rotten fruit drinks - he must be stopped! Only one man is up to the task - Professor Plum! Guide Professor Plum through 30 levels of fruit squash fun as you help him gather up all the delicious fruit to put back into the juicing machine.
